title: Sprint layoffs likely as part of cost-reduction plan
text:
Sprint layoffs likely as part of cost-reduction plan 
Published By: Computerworld.com - Today 
Sprint will likely cut its 31,000-person workforce as part of up to $2.5 billion in cost reductions in the next six months, a company spokes...
